data.title: Social Media Dimensions for 2024
data.meta_description: No need to go anywhere else for your 2022 social media image sizes as we have all the dimensions, you’ll need in our guide below.
data.text:
No need to go anywhere else for your 2024 social media image sizes as we have all the dimensions, you’ll need in our guide below. We will be listing everything you need for Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter, YouTube and TikTok.

The importance of social media visuals is crucial for executing great socials!

In fact, a survey found that 80% of businesses rely heavily on visual content as part of their marketing strategy. The same is true across a range of industries from property marketing to charity and start ups.

Facebook

As the world’s leading social media platform Facebook has 2.9B users, but it is becoming increasingly visual, to follow in the likes of TikTok and Instagram.

Although it is still a ‘social’ platform business users are recommended to avoid going too commercial or product-driven with imagery. Instead, try to convey the personality of your brand by using visuals to display the human side.

Recommended Facebook image sizes for 2024:

Facebook profile picture size: 180 x 180

Facebook cover photo size: 820 x 312

Facebook group cover image size: 1640 x 856

Facebook link image size: 1200 x 630

Facebook image post size: 1200 x 630

Facebook image ad size: 1200 x 628

Facebook event image size: 1920 x 1005

Facebook messenger image ad size: 1200 x 628

Facebook Story ad size: 1080 x 1920

Facebook Reels – 1080 × 1350 (ratio 4:5)

Facebook video size: 1280 x 720

Largest Facebook video length: 240 minutes

Facebook video ad size: 1080 x 1350 (ratio 4:5), at least 1080 x 1080, ratios from 16:9 to 9:16 are also supported

Pro tip:

The attention span of the audience is extremely short on social media, so try to keep Facebook videos as short as possible. While the maximum video length is 240 minutes, Facebook recommends keeping them as short as 15 seconds.

Instagram

A visual platform from the start. Instagram is where you can really have fun with your inner designer. Instagram Stories and Reels are catching most of the attention lately, but you can still easily gain engagement with static imagery too.

Although Instagram is known for its square images, landscape and portrait images are also available. Use the best of the three for your Instagram posts (square, landscape, and portrait). Using the correct social media dimensions will take you from amateur to professional. Choose the right one for your brand and compose your photos or videos accordingly.

Recommended Instagram image sizes for 2024:

Instagram profile picture size: 110 x 110

Instagram photo sizes: 1080 x 1080 (square),

1080 x 566 (landscape), 1080 x 1350 (portrait).

Instagram Stories size: 1080 x 1920

Carousel posts & ads: 1080 x 1080 (square) recommended,

1080 x 566 (landscape) and 1080 x 1350 (portrait) are also supported.

Instagram ads size: 1080 x 1080 (square), 1080 x 566 (landscape).

Recommended Instagram video sizes: 1080 x 1080 (square),

1080 x 566 (landscape), 1080 x 1350 (portrait).

Instagram IGTV video size: 1080 x 1920

Instagram Reels and Live: 1080 x 1920

Pro tip:

We recommend using square and vertical formats when posting on Facebook and Instagram (both organic and paid). Why? Because this maximizes the space you use in the feeds as most people use their phones to browse through these platforms.

LinkedIn

While LinkedIn is known as the business platform it is vital that you show off your brands best side. An attractive LinkedIn profile (both company and employee) is an invaluable asset for your brand.

Aim for high-res, original photos, along with videos and infographics, while using the correct social media dimensions. If recruitment is one of your goals in 2024, use your image and video to show off your company’s best side.

Commercial Property Marketing can benefit from a strong presence on LinkedIn.

Recommended LinkedIn image sizes for 2024:

LinkedIn Company pages:

LinkedIn company logo size: 300 x 300

LinkedIn cover photo size: 1128 x 191

LinkedIn Sponsored Content image size: 1200 x 627

LinkedIn Business Banner image: 646 x 220

LinkedIn image sizes for blog post link images: 1200 x 627

Personal pages:

LinkedIn profile picture size: 400 x 400

LinkedIn background photo size: 1584 x 396

LinkedIn post image size: 1200 x 1200 (square) 1080 x 1350 (portrait)

LinkedIn link post size: 1200 x 627

LinkedIn video size: 256 x 144 (minimum) to 4096 x 2304 (maximum)

Maximum LinkedIn video length: 10 minutes

Twitter / X

Twitter is a fast-moving newsfeed, where you have to stand out to be seen. Striking images and easy-to-read information-packed infographics are one visual tactic brands can use to increase engagement. Charity marketing benefits from Twitters reach and volume of users.

Recommended Twitter image sizes for 2024:

Twitter profile picture size: 400 x 400

Twitter header size: 1500 x 500

Twitter post image size: 1200 x 675

Minimum Twitter card image size: 120 x 120

Twitter image size for ads: 800 x 418 (Website card)

800 x 800 (App card image)

800 x 800 (Carousels)

800 x 418 (Direct Message card)

800 x 418 (Conversation card)

Twitter video size: 720 x 720 pixels (square)

1280 x 720 pixels (landscape)

720 x 1280 pixels (portrait)

Twitter ad size (video): 720 x 720 (square)

1280 x 720 (landscape)

720 x 1280 (portrait)

Video Length: 12 seconds or less (recommended)

2 minutes and 20 seconds (maximum)

YouTube

YouTube has been around for many years and still is the largest video platform. Although you need to meet the video requirements to perform well on YouTube, the resolution and length of the video are quite important, you also need to pay attention to the size of your profile picture, channel cover picture to capture the attention of the audience from the time they land on your YouTube page.

Recommended YouTube image sizes for 2024:

YouTube profile photo size: 800 x 800

YouTube Channel cover picture: 2560 x 1440 (desktop), 1546 x 423 (smartphones)

YouTube thumbnail size: 1280 x 720

YouTube Standard video: Minimum dimension is 426 x 240. Max dimension is 3840 x 2160, aspect ratio 16:9

TikTok

Unbelievably, TikTok has been around since 2016 but exploded across the world in 2020 when the pandemic first hit. TikTok had over 700M users in 2020 and rose to 1B in 2021. TikTok is the latest video-sharing app that people are using, but it’s not just people – brands have joined as well to engage and reach new audiences. Here is what brands need to be aware of when it comes to dimension basics on the app.

Recommended Tik Tok image sizes for 2024:

TikTok Video: 1080 x 1920, maximum 3min.

TikTok Profile photo: 200 x 200

TikTok in-feed ad video aspect ratio: 9:16, 1:1, or 16:9.
